display.name: Remote Write Rate
display.description: Shows rate of incoming Remote Write v1 requests.

display.name: Remote Write Errors
display.description: Shows percentage of errors for incoming Remote Write v1 requests.

spec.query:
sum by (namespace, job, code) (
      rate(
        http_requests_total{code=~"5..",handler="receive",job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]
      )
    )
  / ignoring (code) group_left ()
    sum by (namespace, job) (
      rate(http_requests_total{handler="receive",job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
    )
*
  100

display.name: Remote Write Duration
display.description: Duration percentiles of successful Remote Write requests.

display.name: Appended Samples
display.description: Shows rate of samples appended to Receive TSDB across all tenants.

display.name: Head Series
display.description: Shows number of series in Receive TSDB head across all tenants.

spec.query: sum by (namespace, job) (prometheus_tsdb_head_series{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"})

display.name: Head Chunks
display.description: Shows number of chunks in Prometheus TSDB head across all tenants.

spec.query: sum by (namespace, job) (prometheus_tsdb_head_chunks{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"})

display.name: CPU Usage
display.description: Shows the CPU usage of the component.

spec.query: rate(process_cpu_seconds_total{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])

display.name: Memory Usage
display.description: Shows various memory usage metrics of the component.

spec.query: go_memstats_alloc_bytes{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}
go_memstats_heap_alloc_bytes{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}
rate(go_memstats_alloc_bytes_total{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
rate(go_memstats_heap_alloc_bytes{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
go_memstats_stack_inuse_bytes{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}
go_memstats_heap_inuse_bytes{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}
process_resident_memory_bytes{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}

display.name: Goroutines
display.description: Shows the number of goroutines being used by the component.

spec.query: go_goroutines{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}

display.name: GC Duration
display.description: Shows the Go garbage collection pause durations for the component.

spec.query: go_gc_duration_seconds{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace"}

display.name: Remote Write Rate by tenant
display.description: Shows rate of incoming Remote Write v1 requests split by tenant.

display.name: Remote Write Errors by tenant
display.description: Shows percentage of errors for incoming Remote Write v1 requests split by tenant.

display.name: Average Remote Write Duration by tenant
display.description: Average duration of Remote Write requests by tenants.

display.name: Average Successful Remote Write request size
display.description: Shows average size of successful remote write request.

display.name: Average Failed Remote Write request size
display.description: Shows average size of failed remote write request.

display.name: Inflight remote write requests
display.description: Shows inflight remote write HTTP requests.

display.name: Rate of Series ingested
display.description: Shows rate of timeseries ingested by Receive, split by tenant.

display.name: Rate of Series not ingested
display.description: Shows rate of timeseries not ingested by Receive, split by tenant.

display.name: Rate of Samples ingested
display.description: Shows rate of samples ingested by Receive, split by tenant.

display.name: Rate of Samples not ingested
display.description: Shows rate of samples not ingested by Receive, split by tenant.

display.name: Rate of replication requests
display.description: Shows rate of replication requests between Receives.

display.name: Rate of replication errors
display.description: Shows rate of replication errors between Receives.

display.name: Rate of forward requests
display.description: Shows rate of forward requests between Receives.

display.name: Rate of forward errors
display.description: Shows rate of forward errors between Receives.

display.name: Unary gRPC Write request rate
display.description: Shows rate of handled Unary gRPC Write requests (WritableStore).

display.name: Unary gRPC Write error rate
display.description: Shows percentage of errors of Unary gRPC Write requests (WritableStore).

display.name: Unary gRPC Write duration
display.description: Shows duration percentiles of handled Unary gRPC Write requests (WritableStore).

display.name: Unary gRPC Read request rate
display.description: Shows rate of handled Unary gRPC Read requests (StoreAPI).

display.name: Unary gRPC Read error rate
display.description: Shows percentage of errors of Unary gRPC Read requests (StoreAPI).

display.name: Unary gRPC Read duration
display.description: Shows duration percentiles of handled Unary gRPC Read requests (StoreAPI).

display.name: Stream gRPC Read request rate
display.description: Shows rate of handled Stream gRPC Read requests (StoreAPI Series/Exemplar calls).

display.name: Stream gRPC Read error rate
display.description: Shows percentage of errors of Stream gRPC Read requests (StoreAPI Series/Exemplar calls).

display.name: Stream gRPC Read duration
display.description: Shows duration percentiles of handled Stream gRPC Read requests (StoreAPI Series/Exemplar calls).

display.name: Last Uploaded Block
display.description: Shows the last uploaded block time for Receive.
